data.eml:eml: Four new species of Desmopachria Babington from Peru (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Miller, Kelly B. (2005): Four new species of Desmopachria Babington from Peru (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae). Zootaxa 1059: 39-47, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.170159
